thread.title: Adeptus Partners Expands Footprint with Acquisition of CoMetrics Lenders Advisory Services, LLC

author: cnbc.com
title: Adeptus Partners Expands Footprint with Acquisition of CoMetrics Lenders Advisory Services, LLC

organizations.name: acquisition of cometrics lenders advisory services

text:
NEW YORK, March 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Adeptus Partners, LLC (Adeptus), a noted solutions-based public accounting firm, has recently acquired CoMetrics Lenders Advisory Services, LLC (CLAS) from CoMetrics Partners, LLC (CoMetrics). LAS is a professional service firm that specializes in offering banks, financial, and other lenders, assistance in determining the accuracy of its borrower's collateral. In connection with this strategic acquisition, Adeptus has recruited a number of key professional staff and changed its name to Lenders Advisory Services, LLC (LAS).
"We are pleased to integrate such a high-caliber firm into our operations," said Howard Krant, Managing Partner of Adeptus. "LAS' extensive expertise lends itself well to the collaborative, problem-solving approach that we employ for the benefit of our clients. With this added strength we will be able to offer additional service areas to collateral field examination clients such as credit risk consulting, and internal audit advisory services."
Brian Ash will continue to lead LAS and said, "I am ecstatic about the acquisition and joining forces with Adeptus. After operating in the business for some time, my partners and I decided that in order to achieve our strategic growth potential, we needed to have the significant resources and quality control a multi-office accounting firm provides."
As a result of the acquisition, LAS will have the immediate capability to serve its customers from four regionally-located offices in New York City, Long Island, New Jersey, and Maryland. The acquisition will also give clients access to numerous experienced professionals with diverse business backgrounds. Their extensive knowledge, along with the other positive changes, will translate into improved efficiencies and cost savings. This supports Adeptus Partners' enduring desire to deliver superior expertise and value-added service to meet the needs of its clients.
"Since establishing LAS in 2013, the practice has grown significantly," said Gary Herwitz, managing partner of CoMetrics. "Adeptus provides Brian and the team a national platform to continue that expansion, and better serve the valued clients of LAS."

For more information about CoMetrics and their services, visit https://cometricspartners.nyc or contact Olga Scotto at (212) 381-0871.
About Adeptus Partners LLC
Adeptus Partners, LLC, is a solutions-based certified public accounting firm located in New York City, New Jersey, Long Island, and Maryland. For over 30 years, the firm has serviced individuals and businesses on both a national and international level. Through their collaborative problem-solving approach, Adeptus helps clients make sense of their financial situations. Their experienced professionals stay informed of today's ever-changing tax and business regulatory laws and assist clients in applying these complex rules to their business and personal affairs. Adeptus is led by founding and Managing Partner Howard Krant.
About CoMetrics Partners LLC
CoMetrics Partners (CMP) is a management consulting firm that specializes in providing middle market companies the strategic vision and leadership to integrate operations, technology, and finance to optimize business processes and maximize profitability. CMP partners with executive management to solve complex challenges and achieve meaningful outcomes while mitigating risk. CMP is led by the founding and Managing Partner Gary Herwitz.
